articles.description: With Liverpool taking a 13-point lead at the top of the Premier League table, BBC Sport looks at when they could wrap up the title.
articles.title: When can Liverpool secure the 2024-25 Premier League title?

articles.description: Replacing Jos Buttler as captain could rejuvenate him as a player and is the sensible thing for England to do after Champions Trophy exit, says Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: Jonathan Agnew on Jos Buttler's future as England captain

articles.description: It has been a rocky few months for the Lionesses but victory over Spain proves they are still up there with the world's best.
articles.title: England 1-0 Spain: 'A proper English performance' secures Nations League win

articles.description: Arsenal, Manchester United and Chelsea are among the sides looking for a new striker in the summer. BBC Sport takes a look at who could head to the Premier League.
articles.title: Which strikers could Arsenal buy in the summer to lead them to the title?

articles.description: Manchester City hang on for victory at Tottenham Hotspur to boost their hopes of a top-four finish, as Erling Haaland scores the game's only goal.
articles.title: Tottenham 0-1 Manchester City: Erling Haaland goal in Premier League win

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim will speak to Alejandro Garnacho about his reaction to being substituted in the 3-2 win against Ipswich.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ruben Amorim to ask Alejandro Garnacho about substitution reaction in win over Ipswich

articles.description: Key figures in Formula 1's governing body the FIA are barred from a meeting on Wednesday in a dispute with president Mohammed Ben Sulayem.
articles.title: Formula 1: Key figures barred from FIA meeting after refusing to sign NDA in dispute with Mohammed Ben Sulayem

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Manchester United vs Ipswich Town in the Premier League
articles.title: Manchester United 3-2 Ipswich Town: Maguire heads winner for 10 men

articles.description: After a dreadful start, Rangers recovered at Kilmarnock to record a win in Barry Ferguson's first game in interim charge.
articles.title: Barry Ferguson: Rangers go from 'horrendous' to 'different class' in interim manager's first game

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris tops the time sheets from Mercedes' George Russell on day one of pre-season testing in Bahrain.
articles.title: F1 2025 pre-season testing: Lando Norris quickest for McLaren on day one
